name: cameronsjo
description: Cameron's Claude Code plugins and curated obra/superpowers forks
author: cameronsjo

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: Personality commands - hype, sass, roast, turbo, catchup, doc-to-reference

plugins.name: dev-toolkit
plugins.description: Development workflow tools - logging agents, project checks, release pipelines

plugins.name: session-continuity
plugins.description: Cross-session context with timeline logging and inbox capture

plugins.name: mcp-toolkit
plugins.description: MCP server development toolkit - architecture patterns, tools-as-code

plugins.name: obsidian-dev
plugins.description: Obsidian plugin development - scaffolding, TypeScript patterns, GitHub Actions, BRAT

plugins.name: homebridge-dev
plugins.description: Homebridge plugin development - HAP mappings, accessory patterns, debugging

plugins.name: image-gen-toolkit
plugins.description: Image generation toolkit for Gemini 3 Pro Image - prompt engineering, composition specs, visual grammar. Commercial license required.

plugins.name: homelab
plugins.description: Homelab infrastructure context - Unraid server, media stack, Docker services

plugins.name: superpowers
plugins.description: Core skills library: TDD, debugging, collaboration patterns, and proven techniques

plugins.name: superpowers-chrome
plugins.description: Direct Chrome DevTools Protocol access - skill mode + MCP mode, zero dependencies

plugins.name: superpowers-lab
plugins.description: Experimental skills: tmux automation, MCP server discovery, duplicate detection, Slack messaging

plugins.name: superpowers-developing-for-claude-code
plugins.description: Skills and docs for developing Claude Code plugins, skills, and MCP servers

plugins.name: episodic-memory
plugins.description: Semantic search for Claude Code conversations - remember past discussions across sessions

plugins.name: double-shot-latte
plugins.description: Auto-continues Claude Code work instead of stopping to ask permission

plugins.name: elements-of-style
plugins.description: Writing guidance based on Strunk's The Elements of Style (1918)
